1201.TW.summary: Wei Chuan Foods Corporation engages in the food business in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers tinned food, soy sauce, MSG gourmet powder, seasonings, juice, tetra pak sterilized milk, soy milk, rice milk, cooler drinks, fermented milk, gel, and pudding products. It also engages in the amusement business. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1213.TW.summary: Oceanic Beverages Co., Inc. manufactures and sells apple soda, apple juices, mineral water, and various other soft drinks. The company also distributes beverages, non-staple food products, and processed products. In addition, it manages department store and supermarkets. The company is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1215.TW.summary: Charoen Pokphand Enterprise(Taiwan) Co., Ltd. engages in the agriculture, animal husbandry, and food businesses in Taiwan and internationally. It produces and sells feed for chicken, pigs, and ducks, as well as fresh and frozen chicken, pork, and meat products; and cooked and other related consumable food products. The company also imports and sells animal medicine; and provides husbandry management services for chickens to produce eggs and meat. In addition, it offers agricultural livestock products. The company was formerly known as Taiwan Pokphand Feed Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Charoen Pokphand Enterprise(Taiwan) Co., Ltd. in 1988. The company was founded in 1921 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1218.TW.summary: Taisun Enterprise Co., Ltd. operates in the food and beverage industry in Taiwan. It offers oil and soybean powder products, including selected soybeans, soybean powder, high protein soybean powder, salad oil, cooking oil series, flavoring oil series, sunflower seed oil series, olive oil, healthy good oil, HSF oil series, health food sunflower seed oil, and other blended oils. The company also provides Mesona tea, honey herbal jelly, mixed congee, other congee sweets, iced tea, guava green tea, and bottled water; and aqua feeds for milkfish, tilapia, ayu, bass, grouper, etc. The company offers its products under Cha Chi Chu, Bing Jeon, Taisun Pure Water, TAISUN Cheers, Twist Water, Taisun Fruit Water, Pure Water, Taisun Grass Jelly, Taisun Mesona Tea, Taisun Mixed Congee, Taisun Peanuts Soup, Taisun Other Dessert, Healthy Dessert, Big Straw, Taisun Cooking Oil, ChefOil, Taisun Omega 369 Blended Oil, Cha Street, BUFF, Customized Purpose Good Oil, Commercial Purpose Salad oil, and Commercial Purpose Bulk Vegetable Oil Brands. It also engages in the rental and construction activities. Taisun Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1219.TW.summary: Fwusow Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets feeds, pet food products, cooking oils, and organic fertilizers in Taiwan. It offers canola, soybean, sunflower, and sesame oils; bonito products; and cereals. The company also provides dog and cat foods; and aquarium fish, Koi, bird, experimental animal, duck, pig, poultry, and other feeds. In addition, it offers organic, biotech, instant water soluble, liquid, and gardening fertilizers, as well as organic compound compost products and substrates. Further, the company engages in eco and contract farming activities. Fwusow Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1920 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

1225.TW.summary: Formosa Oilseed Processing Co., Ltd. produces and sells oil and feed products in Taiwan. It offers soybean and palm oil; soybean meat; and feed products, such as soybean, corn, wheat, and barley. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1229.TW.summary: Lien Hwa Industrial Holdings Corporation manufactures and sells flour and flour-based products in China, Taiwan, and internationally. It operates through 5 segments: Rental Business, Noodle Business, Noodle Business Overseas, Administrative Resource Center, and System Integration Service business. The company offers flour, wheat bran, wheat bran grain, wheat germ, wheat flour, gluten flour, patent flour, and durum flour for making bread, pastries, cookies, cakes, Chinese steamed buns, noodles, baozi, and many other flour-based foods, as well as wheat flavor flour, organic whole wheat flour, rice flour, and baking germs; prepared mixes, such as pancake mixes, DIY pizza flour, and other baking flour; and pasta. It also provides various integrated systems and outsourcing services to government agencies, educational units, financial institutions, and public/private enterprises; and acts as an agency to sell the cloud platforms and customer relationship software. In addition, it engages in the integration of computer, microprocessor, I/O equipment, and IC cards; transportation control and card; and RFID technology of the tag, antenna, reader gateway, and system integration for library and factory automation. Further, the company sells and rents land and houses; and manages and develops the real estate. Additionally, it is involved in the wholesaling and retailing business, restaurant business, and investment activities; provision of business management and information consulting services; sale, rental, and maintenance of telephone switching systems and data communication products; communication system project contracting; software research and development; software design; and technology development, promotion, transfer, consulting, and servicing. The company sells its products through distributors and chained stores. Lien Hwa Industrial Holdings Corporation was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1232.TW.summary: TTET Union Corporation operates as a soybean crusher in Taiwan. The company engages in the manufacture, sale, processing, and import and export of a range of vegetable oils. It offers soybean, canola, palm olein, deep frying, and sunflower oils; and dehulled high-protein, dehulled full fat, regular, and full fat soybean meals, as well as soybean hull pellets and high-protein soybean flakes. The company also provides selected soybeans and deodorized distillates. In addition, it is involved in the cogeneration plant business; and wholesale and retail of oils, etc. The company also has operations in Japan, Korea, and internationally. TTET Union Corporation was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

1234.TW.summary: Hey-Song Corporation produces and sells beverages primarily in Taiwan. It offers carbonated drinks under the Heysong Sarsaparilla and Heysong Citron brands; fruit, tea, and camellia green tea drinks under the Heysong brand; coffee drinks under the Wincafe brand; sports drinks under the FIN Healthy-Support Drink name; and water under the Hey-Song name. The company also exports its products. Hey-Song Corporation was founded in 1925 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1236.TW.summary: Hunya Foods Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and trades in food products in Taiwan. The company offers candies, biscuits, chocolates, moon cakes, pastries, bread, pastries, and other food products; and operates gift shops. It also provides its products online. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1258.TWO.summary: Kee Song Bio-Technology Holdings Limited engages in the poultry and processing distribution, and farming business in Singapore, Malaysia, and Taiwan. The company also involves in importing, slaughtering, wholesaling, and retailing various types of poultry and consumable goods; layer and poultry farming; investment holding; property investment; processing and marketing of seafood and poultry related products; provision of supporting services for transportation; food catering; and manufacturing of poultry feed products. In addition, it offers whole chicken and cutting products. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

1264.TWO.summary: Tehmag Foods Corporation operates in the baking industry in Taiwan. The company offers bread products, including margarine flour sheets, flours, flour milling products, instant yeasts, bread improvers, luctor/custido/carlex sprays, bread mixes, flavor powders and series, bread fillings, bread decorations, and sugars; dairy products, such as flÃ©chard sas, other creams, cheese, and dairy whipping creams; and pastry products comprising ingredients for cakes and mousses, waffle mixes, cocoa powders, jelly powders, nappage series/coatings, and ingredients for decor and gold powder. It also provides fruit products consisting of frozen purees, ambiet fruit purees, IQF fruits, frozen coulis, fruit filling series, decorative fruits, fruits preserves, and flavor series. In addition, the company offers liqueur and coffee beans, syrups, juices, and tea; chocolate products; cupcakes; tart shells, cones, savory lines, macarons, and croissants, as well as frozen food; packaging products; and molds, openers, and blades, as well as festival and western bakery products. Tehmag Foods Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1271.TWO.summary: SunWay Biotech Co., LTD. focuses on professional research and development, and technical material manufacturing and processing business. The company researches, designs, and manufactures Monascus purpureus NTU 568; Lactobacillus paracasei subsp. paracasei NTU 101; and related products. It offers dietary supplements, fermented milk and soy-milk, and formula additives in form of capsules, powder sachets, liquid, and tablets. SunWay Biotech Co., LTD. was founded in 2007 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

1702.TW.summary: Namchow Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in manufacturing, selling, and processing of edible and non-edible oil, frozen dough, and dish and laundry liquid detergent products in Taiwan, China, Thailand, and internationally. The company manufactures and sales cleaners, including crystal soap, personal hygiene, and dish/vegetable cleaning products; frozen and instant noodles; ice creams; and cooked rice and leisure foods, such as rice crackers. It is also involved in manufacturing and distribution of baking products, including baking oils, fats, and frozen doughs; and the dining business. In addition, it offers management consulting services. The company was formerly known as Namchow Chemical Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Namchow Holdings Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Namchow Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

1730.TW.summary: Farcent Enterprise Co., Ltd provides consumer products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers deodorants; personal care products, including perfumes; dehumidifiers; home cleaning lotions, such as bath and toilet cleaners, floor cleaners, pipe dredging glue and agents, and cleaning tablets; natural cleaning lotions, including dishwashing liquids, laundry detergents, floor cleaners, laundry tank detergents, and hand washing mousse; home cleaning tools comprising mops, dedusting papers, rags, and cleaning bags; and mosquito repellent products. It offers its products through supermarkets, cosmetic shops, convenient stores, chain stores, and agents, as well as online. The company was formerly known as Eutech Enterprise Co., Ltd and changed its name to Farcent Enterprise Co., Ltd in 1996. Farcent Enterprise Co., Ltd was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1732.TW.summary: Mao Bao Inc. manufactures and sells household and personal care products in Taiwan. The company offers laundry cleaning products, such as detergent, liquid soaps, soft essence, clothes stains, cold wash, and hand wash products; dishwashing liquids; kitchen cleaning, universal cleaning, bathroom cleaning, antibacterial cleaning, and appliances cleaning products; and floor cleaners. It also provides organic anti-mosquito repellents, oils, and gels; and personal cleaning products, such as antibacterial moisturizing hand wash. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1737.TW.summary: Taiyen Biotech Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of salt products under the TAIYEN brand in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include skincare, healthcare, cleaning, aqua, medical supplies, and snack food products. It also operates stores; and engages in the foundry business. The company was founded in 1952 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

1817.TW.summary: Sanitar Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ceramic sanitary products in Taiwan. It offers faucets, acrylic bathtubs, and bathroom cabinets, as well as sinks, toilets, urinals, and accessories. The company was formerly known as Sanken Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sanitar Co., Ltd. in 2003. Sanitar Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2732.TWO.summary: La Kaffa International Co., Ltd. operates cafes that provides tea, Taiwanese traditional desserts, set meals, coffee and bakery products, and Chinese food products in Taiwan and internationally. Its brand portfolio includes Chatime, ZenQ Dessert, La Kaffa Coffee, Wagokoro Tonkatsu Anzu Ginza, Bake Code, Duan Chun Zhen, Osaka Ohsho Taiwan, ChuNian Shabu Shabu and Chatime Lounge. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

2733.TWO.summary: Vigor Kobo Co.,Ltd. develops, produces, and sells Chinese cakes and pastries in Taiwan and internationally. It offers pineapple, red-in-green mini, chestnut mini, black stick mini, milk sun, cheese honey, and taro mini cakes, as well as beef jerky. The company provides its products through its stores. Vigor Kobo Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2756.TWO.long_name: Lian Fa International Dining Business Corp.
2756.TWO.summary: Lian Fa International Dining Business Corporation operates various restaurants. It operates restaurants under the brands of Sharetea, Mamak, and Kampung. The company is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2912.TW.summary: President Chain Store Corporation invests in and manages convenience stores, restaurants, drugstores, department stores, supermarkets, and online shopping stores in Taiwan and internationally. It operates through Convenience Stores, Retail Business Group, Logistics Business Group, and Other segments. The company is involved in the investment activities; publishing of magazines and books; sale of cosmetics and daily items; art and cultural exhibition activities; enterprise information management and consultancy business; network technology development business; and sports and entertainment business. It also offers life and property insurance; collection agency; electronic ticketing; gas station; elevator installation, repair, and maintenance; room and low-temperature food logistics and warehousing; and information software services, as well as manufactures food products. In addition, the company engages in the trucking, and bread and pastry retail businesses; wholesale of merchandise; sale of health care products and pharmaceuticals; sale and rental of cleaning instruments; trading of food and commodities; logistics and warehousing business; and sale of ice cream, as well as operates coffee chain stores and hypermarkets. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 9,900 stores under the 7-ELEVEN name. President Chain Store Corporation was founded in 1978 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3313.TWO.summary: Feei Cherng Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets active/passive electronic components in Taiwan and Internationally. The company's products include MOSFETs, LAN transformers, and polymer caps, as well as diodes, NTC thermistors, MLCC, and crystals. It also distributes. The company offers its products for use in N/B, M/B, smart phones, mobiles, and GPS system applications. Feei Cherng Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4205.TWO.short_name: CHUNG HWA FOOD INDUSTRIAL CO LT
4205.TWO.long_name: Chung Hwa Food Industrial Co., Ltd.
4205.TWO.summary: Chung Hwa Food Industrial Co., Ltd. produces and sells soybean processed foods in Taiwan. It offers tofu products, desserts, and hot pot ingredients. The company sells its products through a network of dealers. It also exports its products to Hong Kong. The company was formerly known as Herng Yih Food Industrial Co Ltd and changed its name to Chung Hwa Food Industrial Co., Ltd. in July 2013. Chung Hwa Food Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4207.TWO.summary: Taiwan Fructose Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells syrup products in Taiwan. The company's products comprise fructose, maltose, isomalto-oligo saccharides, and maltodextrin syrups, as well as non-dairy creamers, vegetable oil powder, dextrose, and sorbitol. Its products are used in a range of applications, including beverages, dairy products, iced products, desserts, bakery food, soy sauces, health foods, candy, jams and jellies, sachima, bean fillings, chewing gums, candied fruits, biscuits, coffee, milk tea, instant drinks, toothpaste, cleaning and makeup products, and interface activators. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4712.TWO.summary: Nan Tsan Co., Ltd, a technology company, develops intelligent robots and artificial intelligence in Taiwan. It is also involved in the production of pigments. The company focuses on the development of 5G and IoT smart home solutions. Nan Tsan Co., Ltd was founded in 1974 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5481.TWO.summary: Sino Tactful Co., Ltd. engages in the education business in Taiwan. It operates early childhood English education platform, K-12 English learning platform and plus cloud digital learning, and travel (study) consultant system, as well as offers AI American listening and speaking textbook. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

5902.TWO.summary: Tait Marketing & Distribution Co., Ltd. imports and trades in consumer goods in Taiwan. It offers tea, coffee, mineral water, beer, wine, liquor, and other beverages; desserts; and sugar cake/snack food products. The company also exports its products. Tait Marketing & Distribution Co., Ltd. was founded in 1845 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6504.TW.summary: Nan Liu Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells household goods in Taiwan. The company operates through four segments: Thermal-Bonded Nonwovens Fabrics, Spunlace Nonwovens Fabrics, Biotechnology, and B2 Post-processing segments. It offers PP air through and thermal bond nonwoven fabrics, which includes baby/adult diaper and sanitary napkin surface material; spunlace nonwoven fabrics, which consists medical grade operation protective clothing fabrics, dust free electronic cleaning cloth, clean wipes, medical drape cloth, and ointment cloth; needle rolled nonwoven fabric, which comprises bra liner and shoulder pad cotton material. Further, the company provides biotech products, consisting wet wipes for infant and adult skin, masks, makeup remover cotton, emulsion liquid cosmetics, such as collagen day cream, placenta night cream, lotions, extracts, eye creams, marine creams, and skincare products. Additionally, it offers grinding wheelsÂstainless steel, copper PCB grinding, wood polishing, and electroplating polishing; high-end air filter cloth; and household articles, which includes household cleaning rags, scouring pads, and other cleaning products. The company also exports its products to Japan and the United States. Nan Liu Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

6523.TWO.summary: Dr. Wu Skincare Co., Ltd. develops and sells skincare products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers cleansers, masks, toners, serums, moisturizers, and sunscreen and eye care products, as well as makeup and body products. It also provides products for acne and pores, hydration, lines and wrinkles, brightening, body care, sensitive skin, and radiant health. The company offers its products through a network of approximately 2200 sales points, as well as e-commerce sales channels. Dr. Wu Skincare Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6574.TWO.summary: Mikobeaute International Co., Ltd. researches and develops, and sells beauty and skin care products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers its products under the EDN, NU+ derma, L'HERBOFLORE, and MIKOBEAUTÃ SPA brand names. It also operates skin care beauty therapy center. Mikobeaute International Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6578.TWO.summary: DaBomb Protein Corp. produces and supplies plant peptides in Asia. It offers hydrolyzed soya peptide products, functional peptides, and natural lactobacillus strains under the da bomb brand. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6764.TWO.summary: Ace Edulink Co., Ltd. provides small to high school short-term study and tutoring services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6790.TWO.long_name: Yuen Foong Yu Consumer Products Co., Ltd.
6790.TWO.summary: Yuen Foong Yu Consumer Products Co., Ltd produces and sells household paper in Taiwan. The company is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

8465.TWO.summary: Tekho Marine Biotech Co., Ltd researches and develops aquatic and aquarium products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers blood fish, larva fish, and adult fish, as well as giant, leopard coral, tiger, and orange-spotted grouper. The company also develops hardware-software products; and imports peripheral products of aquarium fish. In addition, it publishes aquarium books. Tekho Marine Biotech Co., Ltd was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

8489.TWO.summary: Samebest Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of digital cloud curriculum systems primarily in Taiwan. The company also develops personalized action learning solutions through the integration of virtual reality. Its products cover high school, junior high school, middle and upper grades primary school, lower middle grade primary school, kindergarten, and preschool. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

9919.TW.summary: KNH Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells household goods, non-woven fabric products, and machinery equipment in Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Australia, Korea, the United Kingdom, and internationally. Its personal care products include feminine care products; wet wipes, including canister wipes, boxed wipes, refilled packs, travel packs, sachet packs, and towelettes; skincare products, such as facial puffs, beauty masks, and makeup removers; baby diapers; and incontinent care products. Its nonwoven products consist of air through, calender bond, air laid, spunlace, melt blown, composite, and laminated nonwoven products. The company also offers filter media, air filters, and wastewater treatment and water purification solutions for industrial and municipal sectors. KNH Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

9949.TWO.summary: Tittot Company Limited provides glass-art products in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

EOSSD.summary: EOS Inc., through its subsidiaries, markets and distributes various consumer products in the People's Republic of China, Taiwan, Singapore, Malaysia, and rest of Asia. It offers detergents; nutrition and dietary supplements; and skin care products, such as moisturizers, serums, cleansers, toners, body care, exfoliators, acne and oil correctors, facial masks, cleansing devices, and sun care products; and hair-coloring products, as well as water purifying machines. The company also sells and distributes micro-ceramic speakers. It sells its products to local distributors and specialty stores. EOS Inc. was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

NCRA.summary: Nocera, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the aquaculture consulting and management business in the People's Republic of China. The company design, develops, and produces recirculating aquaculture large scale fish tank systems; and expert consulting, technology transfer, and aquaculture project management services to aquaculture management business services. It also provides fish farming containers; and fish farming container services, including sale, installment and maintenance of aquaculture equipment. Nocera, Inc. is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
